name: Starfield Wars
description:
Starfield Wars is a high-speed 3D infinite racing game. Explore the super beautiful universe and escape the big monsters of various planets.
Win the game victory. Race at break-neck speeds through an ever-changing landscape. Collect credits as you race, then use them to purchase items in the integrated shop.

Features
* Various super cool big monsters
* Complete game with addictive gameplay
* Integrated store with in-game currency
* Multi-screen menu system
* Looping intro and game music
